scopes.expenses.card: View and manage card expenses data

apiDescription: The Expenses API allows you to manage accounting and expenses information.
metaDescription: Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We transform finance teams from reactive no-sayers to proactive growth drivers. With Brex, companies spend with confidence by empowering employees to make smarter financial decisions from anywhere. Brex provides corporate cards, business accounts, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses, that make it easy to plan and track all company spend in one place, in real time. Over 20,000 companies from startups to global enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.

parameters.name: expand[]
parameters.description: Get additional details for the expense, e.g. merchant mcc code, by passing in `expand[]=merchant`. Query parameters include `location`, `department`, `merchant`, `receipts.download_uris`, `user`, `budget` and `payment`.

parameters.name: userId[]
parameters.description: Get expenses belong to provided user(s).

parameters.name: parentExpenseId[]
parameters.description: Get itemized expenses belong to provided parent expenses ID(s).

parameters.name: purchasedAtStart
parameters.description: Shows only expenses with a `purchased_at` on or after this date-time. This parameter is the date-time notation as defined by [RFC 3339, section 5.6](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6), e.g. 2022-11-12T23:59:59.999

parameters.name: purchasedAtEnd
parameters.description: Shows only expenses with a `purchased_at` on or before this date-time. This parameter is the date-time notation as defined by [RFC 3339, section 5.6](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6), e.g. 2022-11-12T23:59:59.999

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination. This is the `next_cursor` value returned from the previous response.

responses.description: The pre-signed file upload URI and unique identifier of the request.

parameters.name: expand[]
parameters.description: Get additional details for the expense, e.g. merchant mcc code, by passing in `expand[]=merchant`. Query parameters include `location`, `department`, `merchant`, `receipts.download_uris`, `user`, `budget` and `payment`.

responses.description: The expense object that has expandable fields, e.g., `location`, `department`, and `receipts`.
The pre-signed file upload URI and unique identifier of the request.

repositoryDescription: Brex provides AI-powered finance solutions incl. corporate cards, business accounts, global payments, & intuitive software for smarter spending decisions. Over 20,000 companies trust Brex to control spend efficiently. Brex's {language} SDK for Expenses API generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
typescriptSdkFirstRequestCode:
// List expenses
const listResponse = brexExpenses.cardExpenses.list({
    expand[]: "
?expand[]=merchant&expand[]=location
"
    purchasedAtStart: "
2023-01-01T23:59:59.999
"
    purchasedAtEnd: "
2023-01-10T23:59:59.999
"
})
